task.title: Import Data for Time Off and Allowances
task.shortdesc: The Data Import option imports batch assignments of scheduling teams as well as compliance groups and roles. This option can be used multiple times to assign an employee to different scheduling teams and compliance groups in a date effective manner. In addition, this option enables administrators to import approved time off requests from third-party systems.

step.cmd: From the navigation pane, select Settings and then select Data Import.

Select the icon in the Download Sample column to get the required file format to upload data. The file can be used as the basis for an import file to assign persona values for scheduling. The file includes employee number, first and last names, job, start and end dates, compliance group, and role assignment. It appears at the bottom of the page as a CSV file that you can open.
step.info: The import for approved time off requests includes employee number, company code, start and end dates and times, duration, and policy name. The imported requests appear in an Approved status on the employee persona page (My Team > select employee > Time Off tab). The initial history action type is Import.

step.cmd: Select the icon in the Upload column to upload the file.
